actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3375 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for payment by the Federal Government of certain travel and relocation expenses incurred by persons assigned to positions of employment in accordance with the Intergovernmental Personnel Act of 1970.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Government to pay travel and relocation expenses incurred by persons assigned to positions of employment in accordance with the Intergovernmental Personnel Act of 1970. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 3375)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3375 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for payment by the Federal Government of certain travel and relocation expenses incurred by persons assigned to positions of employment in accordance with the Intergovernmental Personnel Act of 1970.
